The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 01 January is 18,209 (2,107.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 December, there were 3,155 new confirmed cases (365.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 December, there were 2,103 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 50% (1,052 extra cases).
